생존자를 하든, 살인마를 하든 불쾌한 경험만 쌓이는 게임
납득이 안 되는 판정을 방치하고 어처구니 없는 성능의 캐릭터를 출시해서 밸런스를 붕괴시킨다.
게임의 본질은 안중에도 없고 콜라보 떡칠로 애들 돈 빨아 먹을 생각뿐인 게 분명하다.
대규모 패치로 좋은 인상을 주려는 거 같지만 그 면면을 자세히 실속은 없고 유저들이 어떤 경험을 하고 있는지 고민한 흔적도 없다. 패치의 규모가 파격적이기만 할 뿐 그 이상의 가치는 없는 셈이다.

I like this game because of it's simplistic style and suspenseful way of horror. There are a few things I dislike about the game but its just a few map designs and overpowered abilities along with small other problems. Very fun

Ok, lets make it brief and simple, this is my review before 40+ perks reworks and this is my alt account.

PROs

1)  Made for horror fans. Lots of survivors, killers and maps(need to use offering) to pick compared to their early access in 2016.

2) New chapter every 3 months, means we're getting more surv, killer along with a map. 

3) Kinda fun experience if you got full 4-friends in a lobby.

4) Easy to learn, pretty straight forward.
-4a) Survivor basically just run, vault or dropping pallets to avoid being hit.
-4b) Killer just run up and clap survivors ass, preventing them from escaping or doing gens.

5) Fair price for base game and DLC, except for skins.


CONs

1) Hitbox is bigger than the models. In 2020 devs told us that its nothing wrong with hitboxes, its just internet latency between survivors and killer. BUT, sometimes we noticed that we got body blocked/stuck with other survivor/killer/objects eventhough looks like we can go pass them. I know everyone familiar with Huntress hatchet, Freddy's claw, Deathslinger's harpoon, etc.

2) Balancing issue. They will nerfing Iron Will perk which is essential for Ash or any other loud survivors. Maybe they forgot Spirit with Stridor perk could easily find injured survivor. This game would never be balance since they keep adding overpowered/less effort perks for both sides. That is how meta perks are born. BUT, even based on current PTB 6.1.0, I think they're gonna have balancing in the future, they still doesn't look balance to me.

3) False advertisement. Remembered when Legion, Ash Williams, Laurie and Mikaela were release? Yeah, these characters are broken specially Mettle of Man and Decisive Strike perks and how the old Legion's Frenzy work. They're paid DLC, I'm not complaining they nerfed the old Borrowed Time since its free. Don't get me wrong, they did good job on Freddy and Doctor.  

4) Report and hacker issues. Report doesn't do anything, I submitted some complete report along with videos prove but they not even answering it and those hackers a still playing, not even have a banned record on their steam profile. 3 times my report with different hackers got ignored. So its safe to cheat, but don't use a cheap one.

5) Survivor are helpless if they got facecamped, specially by Bubba or Trickster. "JuSt dO tHe GeNs IdIoT", "BrInG BT nExT tImE". Do you think its fun finding a match for like 7 minutes and got facecamped to death?
Same goes for getting slugged by a high mobility killer like Nurse or Blight. If you think we should always equip meta perks like DS, BT, Unbreakable and Deliverance, what's the point of devs made other perks?

6) New update along with new bugs and they take a really long time to fix them.

7) Boring and repetitive interaction. Holding M1 to repair gens, heal, mend, opening exit gate. 
Being chase? Just run around the obstacle and drop the pallet when killer can hit you.

8) Despite all these issues, announcing David King as the first gay character and make a DBD Dating Simulator is far more important and the DBD Game Director, Mathieu Cote suggesting us to play something else instead of polishing their game. Pretty good job so far.

9) This game could cause mental illness, please know when to stop. If you're killer main getting shamed by swf sweaty squad, please don't revenge on other survivors on your next match, they're innocent unless proven toxic behaviour.
Same goes for survivor, don't teabag or clicky for no reasons, just escape when others teammates are safe/can't be save, don't bother waiting for killer to see you doing your $h1t. We're dealing with people here, and we're here to having fun, please have common sense.

This game got A LOT OF ISSUES. Keep in mind its just a video game, just go whatever perks build you want as long as you're having fun with or without friends. 


Yours truly,
- Survivor & killer main, former streamer, 4.5k+ hrs, not a legacy btw.

great game that I feel threads the needle in a few categories. 1. Only Asymetrical game that is even remotely balanced. 2. Is a casual competitive game, where you are incentivized to try but you are rewarded for doing things that arent necessarily optimal to your survival so you never quite know what to expect. Its not without its problems if you play to be as good as you can be the meta can be quite stale, but there is a rework coming down the pipeline to address that issue. The fact that it still has a community and just celebrated its 6th anniversary is proof enough its a good game.

Its a great game even though the SBMM that it claims to have is not as great as I'd hoped it would be. As someone that has only today started playing the game for the first time, getting matched with people/killers WAY out of my league has been slightly discouraging. That said though, I have just bagged my first win as survivor so maybe it forces a faster skill increase because of it. 
The gameplay itself has been smooth although I have had issues with getting disconnected on some of the matches, this could be down to my own hardware so have invested in a better ethernet cable, so fingers crossed. 
The newer wiggle mechanic is great and I much prefer it to the A, D style that I had initially had bound and allows for more great skill checks. 
The killers are varied and I haven't been matched up with the same killer type as of yet.

Good and fun game but toxic community! Been playing this when it was first released but the PC port is so toxic it takes the fun out of it. If you're going to take this so seriously to feel the need to call other play names and vile insults in the chat box in the lobby, then maybe you shouldn't play.

Reason I still recommend the game is when you get decent people and good team mates, its fun.
